TEXT.TITLE: CARGILL U.K. STRIKE TALKS POSTPONED
TEXT.BODY: Talks due today between management and unions to try to end the strike at Cargill U.K. Ltd's Seaforth oilseed crushing plant have been rescheduled for Thursday, a company spokesman said. Oilseed processing at the plant has been halted since December 19 when mill workers walked out in protest at new contract manning levels. Reuter
